title: Lead QA- SDK Professionals
tagsAndSkills: Computer science,GIT,Defect tracking,QA Lead,Selenium,SDK,Manager Quality Control,software quality
jobDescription:
The Quality Analysis team is responsible for setting, maintaining, and enforcing software Quality Control and Analysis ensuring that the development teams adhere to the highest standards of quality, documentation, and performance in any piece of software they release.

The Lead QA Android position is an individual contributor role. Your role is highly dynamic and platform-agnostic acting as a torchbearer of Quality for software developed across platforms Unity3D, Android, iOS, Web.

You will be solely responsible for ensuring that our users across the globe get the highest quality of performance and responsiveness with a bug-free experience while using any of our software products.

Your work at Tesseract will be key in shaping the user journey of millions of Mixed Reality users globally in the coming years.

  • Performed deep-dive analysis of complex systems and extract that knowledge into comprehensive, customer-obsessed end-to-end testing strategies

  • Proactively communicated and collaborated with internal teams to analyze QA needs and functional requirements and deliver the following artifacts as needed: High-Level QA Architecture, Low-Level QA Architecture, Unit Test Architectures, Integration Test Architectures, Use Case Test Architectures, etc.

  • Critically evaluated software architectures gathered from multiple sources, reconcile conflicts, decompose high-level information into details, abstract up from low-level information to a general understanding.

  • Successfully engage in multiple initiatives simultaneously

  • Driven and challenged product units on their assumptions of how they will successfully execute their plans

  • Set and enforced quality benchmarks across software development teams fo delivering high-performant, responsive and bug-free software products.

  • Developed QA requirements specifications according to standard templates

  • Liaison between the product units, technology, support and IT development teams.

  • Agile software delivery process using JIRA (including breaking down work into modular tasks, updating/tracking task status/work log entries for sprint management), Gerrit/Git (source code management including branching strategy, code review) and Automation Tools.

Job Specification

  • Bachelor s or Master s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.

  • 7+ years manual and 3+ years of automated functional software test experience.
  • Experience using with at least 2 testing framework or tool (i.e. Cucumber, Selenium, Appium, TestCafe, Cypress, Puppeteer, etc)

  • Experience with scripting languages.

  • Experience testing Android mobile applications.

  • Experience with Continuous Integration using Jenkins (or similar tools).

  • Experience with source control systems such as Git.

  • Excellent understanding of test engineering best practices, methodologies, and processes.

  • Experience testing Android mobile applications.

  • Ability to quickly learn new systems.

  • Experience using JIRA (or other defect tracking tools).

  • Experience in working in an Agile SCRUM development environment.

  • Experience testing Web APIs is a plus.

title: Unity3D Professionals
jobDescription:
• The XR Experiences team is part of the Design and Customer Experience team in the organization and is responsible for building delightful, consistent, intuitive, and engaging immersive experiences on JioGlass for our B2C customers across Media & Entertainment, Learning, Shopping, Gaming and Productivity; and our B2B enterprise customers across Remote Assistance, Communication & Collaboration and Enterprise learning use-cases
  • The SSE Unity3D position is an individual contributor role
  • You will be responsible for architecting, planning, designing, developing and testing new and unique applications for Mixed Reality shaping user experience and overall product development
  • You will be working with an interdisciplinary team of Unity3D Developers, UI Designers, UX Designers, Unity3D Technical Artists, 3D content creators, sound production and PR involved, and fully immersed in creating initial concepts, prototyping, and development in Unity3D, launch and post-launch relationships with distributors and partners

Your work at Tesseract will be key in shaping the user journey of millions of Mixed Reality users globally in the coming years.

A portfolio of professional projects including work with web/mobile/AR/VR applications in a must have requirement while applying for this job.

  • Designed and developed consumer grade applications/games in Unity3D.

  • Proactively communicate and collaborate with internal customers to analyze information needs and functional requirements and deliver the following artifacts as needed: Functional/Business Requirements, High-Level Architecture, Low-Level Architecture, System Requirements, Design Documents, Wireframe, etc

  • Critically evaluate information gathered from multiple sources, reconcile conflicts, decompose high-level information into details, abstract up from low-level information to a general understanding, and distinguish user requests from the underlying true needs

  • Successfully engage in multiple initiatives simultaneously

  • Drive and challenge product units on their assumptions of how they will successfully execute their plans

  • Serves as the conduit between the product/customer community and the software development team through which requirements flow

  • Develop requirements specifications according to standard templates

  • Be the liaison between the product units, technology, support and IT development teams.

  • Agile software delivery process using JIRA (including breaking down work into modular tasks, updating/tracking task status/work log entries for sprint management), Gerrit/Git (source code management including branching strategy, code review) and Automation Tools.

Job Specification

  • Bachelor s or Master s degree in Computer Science, Game Design, Game Development or relevant field.

  • 15+ Years of Experience in game/application development.

  • 7+ Years of Experience in Unity3D based game development

  • 5+ Years of Experience in delivering high-quality consumer applications/games built using Unity3D, preferably over mobile platforms.

  • Proven experience of managing and mentoring a team of 10+ Unity3D developers as senior or lead role.

  • Advanced C#/C++ knowledge with architecture and design patterns.

  • Solid OOPs programming skills and design patterns.

  • Strong mathematical skills, knowledge of vectors, matrices, and linear algebra.

  • Strong knowledge of Unity3D application life cycles, Editor Tools, Events, Actions, Input System, Rendering Pipeline.

  • Strong knowledge of designing state machines and multi-level games/applications in Unity3D.

  • Experience in maintaining Performance & Optimisation in Unity3D Applications.

  • Strong knowledge of Networking APIs in Unity3D.

Desired Skills

  • Experience architecting and developing editor tools for Unity3D.

  • Experience in architecting and developing high-peformant shaders and graphics libraries for Unity3D.

  • Experience in building XR applications/SDKs for Hololens, Magic Leap, Oculus, HTC Vive, etc.

  • Experience in building consumer applications for mixed reality is a huge plus.

title: Sr. BSP Engineer
jobDescription:
The BSP Engineer team is part of the Software Core Services group in the organization and is responsible for Developing/Customizing/Maintain Linux Kernal for Android OS and management of the entire Mixed Reality ecosystem core libraries and tools.

The Sr.BSP Engineer position is an individual contributor role. He/she will work as an interface between Engineers, Developers, Operations, and Support staff.

The Sr. BSP Engineer position requires expert level proficiency in technology, hands-on programming skills, and the ability to translate low-level business requirements into technology execution.

  • Will be responsible for Developing/Customizing/ Maintain Linux Kernel for Android OS
  • Develop Board Support Packages, Participate in bootloader, Kernel Bring up and development and Debug Bring up issues.
  • Work on integrating high speed peripherals Camera, USB Camera.
  • Work on UAC Framework, Audio HAL, Audio Framework, ALSA
  • Work on USB Audio kernel subsystem.
  • Resolve defects/issues on timely manner to meet goals and project timeline.
  • Design Unit tests and perform unit testing.
  • Work with various stake holders of different divisions and provide timely updates
Job Specifications:
  • Minimum 5+ Years of dedicated experience in embedded system development.
  • Very good programming skills in C and Linux.
  • Good understanding of core kernel concepts and Linux kernel internals
  • Basic understanding of Qualcomm chipset arch build tools, reference board, flashing procedures.
  • Knowledge of Android/Linux OS architecture. Good Knowledge on USB Subsystem, USB Audio Class.
  • Very good programming skills in C with system programming experience in Linux.
  • Strong preference for engineers with Wearable Product development and sustenance experience.
  • Excellent debugging skills in low-level kernel area
  • Can work independently with minimal supervision.
  • Good team player and easy to work with various stake holders of different divisions.
  • Educational Requirements
  • Bachelor s or Master s degree in Electronics Engineering/Communications Engineering/Software Engineering/Embedded Systems Engineering/ Computer Engineering.
  • Patents / Certified Android or Linux Developer will be highly preferred.
